A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing. Luke deserved better. Massive plot holes. Terrible use of the force as a FaceTime platform. Flying through space. Wasted subplots and characters. Please have more people agree and proof scripts and story directions before. Even if you feel it's formulaic\, remember it's a formula that works. Star Wars is like a warm glassed milk. It's comfort food.\nWhat we got was spoiled milk. Don't take too many risks. We want similar movies. Good vs bad. A brave and strong luke. Developed villains. Strong family conflict and ties. I could go on. I was so excited for this film\, and the more I think about it it's 35 percent good and 65 percent bad. I liked looper. This feels like the first Star Wars I have zero desire to view a second time in the theater.
